attributes.action: Pay employees of ALL Small Businesses 75% of their wages through COVID 19 crisis
attributes.additional_details:
This action will help 5.82 million businesses with less than 0-49 employees.

Three fifths of the employment and around half of turnover in the UK private sector

16.6 million workers (60% of UK workforce)

Estimated turnover of £2.2 trillion (52% of GDP)

MOST of these businesses are not eligible for any Grants and are being pressed to apply for Bank Loans that will only ADD to the impact on their businesses.
attributes.background:
Pay 75% of ALL small business  employees wages for three months.

The Governments COVID-19 support package for businesses does not account for MOST Small  Businesses in the UK. 

They are in crisis and many will close for good.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you would like the Government to take. The Government has announced the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme, which pays 80% of regular wages for employees that need to be furloughed, including employees of small businesses. You can find out how to claim these here: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/claim-for-wage-costs-through-the-coronavirus-job-retention-scheme

You can find further information on support for small businesses here: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-business-support-grant-funding-guidance-for-businesses

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:  

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
